name: Pine Park Health
headline: We provide primary care in senior living communities.
description:
We're a primary care practice that helps residents of senior living communities lead healthier, happy lives.

Our mission is to keep senior living residents healthy—by keeping them away from hospitals where exposure to health risks is high. Through our new clinical care delivery model, we bring clinicians right into senior living communities, providing safer, more convenient primary care. Pine Park partners with senior living communities to provide primary care to their residents, building a value-based care model where we keep patients healthier. This allows us to provide comprehensive healthcare on-site, see patients regularly, and better support their holistic health.

# Bringing the doctor’s office _to you_
Get great medical care in the comfort of home from primary care providers who listen and can see you for urgent issues.There’s no fee to sign up and we accept most insurance.
[Become a patient](http://pineparkhealth.com/<#>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/63323de11f8d5148171c4a90_Arrow.svg)

# Bringing the doctor’s office _to you_
Experience the convenience of in-home primary care with Pine Park Health. Our board-certified providers visit you in your home, get to know you, and provide personalized care.
[Become a patient![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634ebe1076231b1309498ad7_Arrow.svg)](http://pineparkhealth.com/</sign-up>)
![Pine Park provider with a patient](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a2c08a29d57e60916bc_PineParkHealth-Home-3.jpg)![an older adult playing with grandson](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a2c97ef135e9ec1df10_PineParkHealth-Home-1.jpg)![older woman laughing and walking with a walker](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a2cdd60ed83fb249511_PineParkHealth-Home-2.jpg)![older adult smiling and reading](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a2b99b5572bd9538a90_PineParkHealth-Home-4.jpg)![two older adults sitting on a bench on a sunny day](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a2ce735484124f22a43_PineParkHealth-Home-5.jpg)
![older woman smiling and holding a necklace](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a1d08a29d17e70914b9_PineParkHealth-Experts-in-care.jpg)
## Experts in medical care for older adults
We specialize in healthcare for residents of senior living communities and can treat most health concerns from diabetes to dementia, high cholesterol to heart disease.
[Meet the team![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6332561ad2509f069a75d2eb_Arrow.svg)](http://pineparkhealth.com/</clinical-team>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a1d08a29d17e70914b9_PineParkHealth-Experts-in-care.jpg)
## Get primary care from home
We are in your community regularly so you can avoid the hassle of a typical doctor’s visit and access primary care without the long drives and wait times.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6332561ad2509f069a75d2eb_Arrow.svg)](http://pineparkhealth.com/</why-pine-park>)
![Pine Park primary care provider with a patient looking at a computer screen together](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a1dd110dc9171161916_PineParkHealth-Get-care-from-home.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6335e65f0eb3df8bdbf03ea9_PPH-%20textures-Navy%201.svg)![Patient in a virtual primary care appointment with a Pine Park Health provider](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a1dea673ee7051abe9a_PineParkHealth-RapidCare-NotBlurry.jpg)
## Rapid Care when you need it most
Don’t wait weeks to see a doctor or worry about going to urgent care. Our clinical support line is available 24/7 for urgent medical issues or concerns. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6345cb316badd234164389df_PPH-%20textures-Navy%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a1dea673ee7051abe9a_PineParkHealth-RapidCare-NotBlurry.jpg)
## Embedded in your community
We collaborate with community staff regularly, host programming to promote great health and quality of life, and coordinate care with staff in Assisted Living or Memory Care.
![patient in wheelchair ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6352a23495c09b5725d1b483_gettyimages-1255030058-170667a%201.svg)![older man reading](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/633f55e5ba42964255e53775_gettyimages-489582801-170667a%202.svg)![patient sewing](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/633f55e644f6f82289b0742e_danie-franco-CeZypKDceQc-unsplash%201.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/633f5614579e830b2062e73c_Mark.svg)![Kendell Cannon, MD with a patient in his home](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a2697ef1353b8c1df02_PineParkHealth-Community-4.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/635950791f2a2ed5cfb5c1aa_Group%20220.png)

[Explore services![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6332561ad2509f069a75d2eb_Arrow.svg)](http://pineparkhealth.com/</services>)
# No extra fees
We don’t charge patients any sign-up or membership fees. 
We want to make care easier to access and less expensive so we don’t charge patients any sign-up fees or monthly costs.
## We accept Original Medicare and Medicare Advantage
We work with your insurance just like any other doctor’s office.

## Give your residents unmatched medical care
See which senior living operators work with Pine Park Health to help their residents get the medical care they need. 
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6332561ad2509f069a75d2eb_Arrow.svg)](http://pineparkhealth.com/</for-communities>)
![older woman smiling](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/633ee47a578ede3d79879a93_Stocksy_comp_909223-cutout%201.svg)
## Primary care defined
Primary care is a comprehensive approach to medicine that focuses on you as a person, not a collection of symptoms or diseases. Your primary care provider (PCP) becomes the expert in you and helps you live healthy — physically, mentally, emotionally, and socially. Pine Park Health’s PCPs are specially trained to manage all of your health, keep track of changes, and promote quality of life. They coordinate all of your medical care with specialists, family members, your community, and other healthcare professionals — so you don’t have to. Our goal is to help you achieve better health and save you time, money, and energy.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6345bb95b55d149896c4d2c7_fred-kearney-o-ioeoATbIM-unsplash_BW%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6345b9c499c443b71002fb59_fred-kearney-o-ioeoATbIM-unsplash_BW%201.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6345bb9401e3a18549a7f2ca_gettyimages-545881807-170667a%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6345b9bda02aadb1f96d1878_gettyimages-545881807-170667a%201.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6345bb95d780b54e0ff8acf5_Stocksy_comp_2432378%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6345b9bd8200dd5dbbc86ab3_Stocksy_comp_2432378%201.svg)
# Bringing the doctor’s office _to you_
Experience the convenience of in-home primary care with Pine Park Health. Our board-certified providers visit you in your home, get to know you, and provide personalized care.
Become a patient![⟨12⟩](http://pineparkhealth.com/</sign-up>)
![Pine Park provider with a patient⟨15⟩]![an older adult playing with grandson⟨16⟩]![older woman laughing and walking with a walker⟨17⟩]![older adult smiling and reading⟨18⟩]![two older adults sitting on a bench on a sunny day⟨19⟩]
![older woman smiling and holding a necklace⟨20⟩]
## Experts in medical care for older adults
We specialize in healthcare for residents of senior living communities and can treat most health concerns from diabetes to dementia, high cholesterol to heart disease.
Meet the team![⟨21⟩](http://pineparkhealth.com/</clinical-team>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a1d08a29d17e70914b9_PineParkHealth-Experts-in-care.jpg)
## Get primary care from home
We are in your community regularly so you can avoid the hassle of a typical doctor’s visit and access primary care without the long drives and wait times.
Learn more![⟨21⟩](http://pineparkhealth.com/</why-pine-park>)
![Pine Park primary care provider with a patient looking at a computer screen together⟨22⟩]
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6335e65f0eb3df8bdbf03ea9_PPH-%20textures-Navy%201.svg)![Patient in a virtual primary care appointment with a Pine Park Health provider⟨23⟩]
## Rapid Care when you need it most
Don’t wait weeks to see a doctor or worry about going to urgent care. Our clinical support line is available 24/7 for urgent medical issues or concerns. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/6345cb316badd234164389df_PPH-%20textures-Navy%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634d7a1dea673ee7051abe9a_PineParkHealth-RapidCare-NotBlurry.jpg)
## Embedded in your community
We collaborate with community staff regularly, host programming to promote great health and quality of life, and coordinate care with staff in Assisted Living or Memory Care.
![patient in wheelchair ⟨24⟩]![older man reading⟨25⟩]![patient sewing⟨26⟩]![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/633f5614579e830b2062e73c_Mark.svg)![Kendell Cannon, MD with a patient in his home⟨27⟩]![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/635950791f2a2ed5cfb5c1aa_Group%20220.png)
## Services to help you _feel your best_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/633c2de7fc88c95e5418d78f_Care.svg)
Preventive care and chronic condition management
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/633c2de7ac171f73941c38ce_Blood.svg)
Diagnostic testing in your local community or at home
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd2b81fa8ede56efeece238/634ea7407dced178adacab15_Medication.png)
Help reducing unnecessary medications
Explore services![⟨21⟩](http://pineparkhealth.com/</services>)
# No extra fees
We don’t charge patients any sign-up or membership fees. 
We want to make care easier to access and less expensive so we don’t charge patients any sign-up fees or monthly costs.
## We accept Original Medicare and Medicare Advantage
We work with your insurance just like any other doctor’s office. 
In-network with major health plans including

## What you get that’s different

## Give your residents unmatched medical care
See which senior living operators work with Pine Park Health to help their residents get the medical care they need. 
Learn more![⟨21⟩](http://pineparkhealth.com/</for-communities>)
![older woman smiling⟨29⟩]
## Primary care defined
Primary care is a comprehensive approach to medicine that focuses on you as a person, not a collection of symptoms or diseases. Your primary care provider (PCP) becomes the expert in you and helps you live healthy — physically, mentally, emotionally, and socially. Pine Park Health’s PCPs are specially trained to manage all of your health, keep track of changes, and promote quality of life. They coordinate all of your medical care with specialists, family members, your community, and other healthcare professionals — so you don’t have to. Our goal is to help you achieve better health and save you time, money, and energy.
## We’re accepting new patients
Sign up now![⟨12⟩](http://pineparkhealth.com/</sign-up>)
Questions? Call 1–888–512–1208⟨30⟩

generated_description:
**Pine Park Health: Revolutionizing Senior Care**

Pine Park Health is a unique primary care provider founded in 2018, a brainchild of the Y Combinator Batch S18. Their mission is refreshingly straightforward: keep residents of senior living communities healthy and out of hospitals. By embedding clinical care directly into these communities, they minimize exposure to health risks. This approach turns traditional healthcare on its head, offering convenience, personal attention, and a more supportive environment for seniors.

### What They Do
Pine Park Health provides on-site primary care tailored specifically for older adults. Imagine having a dedicated healthcare professional come to your home or community regularly. This model not only limits the stress that comes from hospital visits but also emphasizes continuous care—keeping an eye on everything from diabetes to dementia.

The healthcare team, made up of 75 skilled employees based in Oakland, CA, collaborates closely with senior living staff to deliver a holistic healthcare experience. They offer a full suite of services: preventive care, chronic condition management, and even diagnostic testing—all aimed at making seniors feel their best without the hassle of traditional doctor’s office visits.

### How It Works
In practical terms: there are no extra fees for signing up, and they accept many forms of insurance, including Medicare and Medicare Advantage. This means that getting care doesn’t have to come with a financial burden—a refreshing change in an often convoluted healthcare landscape. 

In addition, Pine Park Health prioritizes rapid care. Their clinical support line is available 24/7—a reassuring safety net for any urgent health concerns, whether late at night or on weekends. 

### What's Unique
What sets Pine Park apart is not just in-home visits but also the intention behind these interactions. They seek to build relationships, understand patients deeply, and foster an environment where healthcare feels personalized rather than transactional. 

This embedded approach in the community translates into regular health programming and collaboration with Assisted Living or Memory Care staff as well, which helps promote overall quality of life.

### In Summary
Pine Park Health is redefining what primary care looks like for seniors. By taking healthcare where seniors live, they eliminate the barriers that often prevent older adults from receiving the care they need. The philosophy here is clear: deliver personalized, compassionate care that fits seamlessly into the lives of seniors, helping them thrive in their communities. 

For more information or to become a patient, visit their website: [Pine Park Health](http://pineparkhealth.com).
